trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: New-PSSessionOption
trans-unit.target: New-PSSessionOption

trans-unit.source: New-PSSessionOption
trans-unit.target: New-PSSessionOption

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Creates an object that contains advanced options for a PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包含 PSSession 高级选项的对象。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **New-PSSessionOption** cmdlet creates an object that contains advanced options for a user-managed session (**PSSession**).
trans-unit.target: **New-pssessionoption** cmdlet 创建一个包含用户托管的会话的高级的选项的对象 (**PSSession**)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the object as the value of the **SessionOption** parameter of cmdlets that create a **PSSession**, such as New-PSSession, Enter-PSSession, and Invoke-Command.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用对象的值作为 **SessionOption** 创建的 cmdlet 参数 **PSSession**, ，例如 New-pssession、 Enter-pssession 和 Invoke-command。

trans-unit.source: Without parameters, **New-PSSessionOption** generates an object that contains the default values for all of the options.
trans-unit.target: 不带参数， **New-pssessionoption** 生成包含的所有选项的默认值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Because all of the properties can be edited, you can use the resulting object as a template, and create standard option objects for your enterprise.
trans-unit.target: 由于所有属性都是可编辑的，因此你可以将生成的对象用作模板，并为你的企业创建标准选项对象。

trans-unit.source: You can also save a session option object in the **$PSSessionOption** preference variable.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以保存在一个会话选项对象 **$PSSessionOption** 首选项变量。

trans-unit.source: The values of this variable establish new default values for the session options.
trans-unit.target: 会话选项的新的默认值由此变量的值建立。

trans-unit.source: They effective when no session options are set for the session and they take precedence over options set in the session configuration, but you can override them by specifying session options or a session option object in a cmdlet that creates a session.
trans-unit.target: 在未为该会话设置会话选项时它们是有效的，并且优先于在会话配置中设置的选项，但可以通过在创建会话的 cmdlet 中指定会话选项或会话选项对象来替代它们。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the **$PSSessionOption** preference variable, see about_Preference_Variables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113248).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息 **$PSSessionOption** 首选项变量，请参阅 about_Preference_Variables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113248)。

trans-unit.source: When you use a session option object in a cmdlet that creates a session, the session option values take precedence over default values for sessions set in the $PSSessionOption preference variable and in the session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 当在创建会话的 cmdlet 中使用会话选项对象时，会话选项值优先于默认值为在 $PSSessionOption 首选项变量和会话配置中设置的会话。

trans-unit.source: However, they do not take precedence over maximum values, quotas or limits set in the session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它们不优先于在会话配置中设置的最大值、配额或限制。

trans-unit.source: For more information about session configurations, see about_Session_Configurations (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145152).
trans-unit.target: 有关会话配置的详细信息，请参阅 about_Session_Configurations (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145152)。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Create a default session option
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 创建默认会话选项

trans-unit.source: This command creates a session option object that has all of the default values.
trans-unit.target: 此命令创建会话选项对象的所有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Configure a session by using a session option object
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 配置会话使用会话选项对象

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use a session option object to configure a session.
trans-unit.target: 此示例显示了如何使用会话选项对象来配置会话。

trans-unit.source: The first command creates a new session option object and saves it in the value of the $pso variable.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令将创建一个新的会话选项对象，并将其保存在 $pso 变量的值中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the New-PSSession cmdlet to create a session on the Server01 remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 New-pssession cmdlet 在 Server01 远程计算机上创建会话。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the session option object in the value of the $pso variable as the value of the *SessionOption* parameter of the command.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用会话选项对象 $pso 变量的值中的值作为 *SessionOption* 命令的参数。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Start an interactive session
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 启动交互式会话

trans-unit.source: This command uses the Enter-PSSession cmdlet to start an interactive session with the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用 Enter-pssession cmdlet 来启动与 Server01 计算机的交互式会话。

trans-unit.source: The value of the *SessionOption* parameter is a **New-PSSessionOption** command that has the *NoEncryption* and *NoCompression* parameters.
trans-unit.target: 值 *SessionOption* 参数是 **New-pssessionoption** 命令 *NoEncryption* 和 *NoCompression* 参数。

trans-unit.source: The **New-PSSessionOption** command is enclosed in parentheses to make sure that it runs before the **Enter-PSSession** command.
trans-unit.target: **New-pssessionoption** 命令括在圆括号中以确保它运行之前 **Enter-pssession** 命令。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Modify a session option object
trans-unit.target: 示例 4︰ 修改会话选项对象

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates that you can modify the session option object.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示您可以修改该会话选项对象。

trans-unit.source: All properties have read/write values.
trans-unit.target: 所有属性都具有读/写值。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a standard session object for your enterprise, and then create customized versions of it for particular uses.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法为你的企业创建标准会话对象，然后针对特定用途创建该对象的自定义版本。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Create a preference variable
trans-unit.target: 示例 5︰ 创建首选项变量

trans-unit.source: This command creates a $PSSessionOption preference variable.
trans-unit.target: 此命令创建 $PSSessionOption 首选项变量。

trans-unit.source: When the $PSSessionOption preference variable occurs in the session, it establishes default values for options in the sessions that are created by using the **New-PSSession**, **Enter-PSSession**, and Invoke-Command cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 它通过使用创建的会话中会话 $PSSessionOption 首选项变量时，在建立选项默认值 **New-pssession**, ，**Enter-pssession**, ，和 Invoke-command cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To make the $PSSessionOption variable available in all sessions, add it to your Windows PowerShell session and to your Windows PowerShell profile.
trans-unit.target: 若要使 $PSSessionOption 变量可在所有会话中，将其添加到你的 Windows PowerShell 会话和 Windows PowerShell 配置文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the $PSSessionOption preference variable, see about_Preference_Variables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113248).
trans-unit.target: 有关 $PSSessionOption 首选项变量的详细信息，请参阅 about_Preference_Variables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113248)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about profiles, see about_Profiles (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113729).
trans-unit.target: 有关配置文件的详细信息，请参阅 about_Profiles (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113729)。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Fulfill the requirements for a remote session configuration
trans-unit.target: 示例 6︰ 满足远程会话配置的要求

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use a **SessionOption** object to fulfill the requirements for a remote session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 **SessionOption** 对象来满足远程会话配置的要求。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the **New-PSSessionOption** cmdlet to create a session option object that has the **SkipCNCheck** property.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用 **New-pssessionoption** cmdlet 来创建会话选项对象具有 **SkipCNCheck** 属性。

trans-unit.source: The command saves the resulting session object in the $skipCN variable.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将生成的会话对象保存在 $skipCN 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the New-PSSession cmdlet to create a new session on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 New-pssession cmdlet 在远程计算机上创建新的会话。

trans-unit.source: The $skipCN check variable is used in the value of the *SessionOption* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 中的值使用 $skipCN 检查变量 *SessionOption* 参数。

trans-unit.source: Because the computer is identified by its IP address, the value of the *ComputerName* parameter does not match any of the common names in the certificate that is used for Secure Sockets Layer (SSL).
trans-unit.target: 因为该计算机被识别由其 IP 地址的值 *ComputerName* 参数与任何使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 证书中的普通名称都不匹配。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the **SkipCNCheck** option is required.
trans-unit.target: 因此， **SkipCNCheck** 选项是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Example 7: Make arguments available to a remote session
trans-unit.target: 示例 7︰ 使参数可用于远程会话

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the *ApplicationArguments* parameter of the **New-PSSessionOption** cmdlet to make additional data available to the remote session.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用 *ApplicationArguments* 参数 **New-pssessionoption** cmdlet，以使其他数据可用于远程会话。

trans-unit.source: The first command creates a hash table with two keys, Team and Use.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令将创建一个具有两个键（Team 和 Use）的哈希表。

trans-unit.source: The command saves the hash table in the $team variable.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将该哈希表保存在 $team 变量中。

trans-unit.source: For more information about hash tables, see about_Hash_Tables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135175).
trans-unit.target: 有关哈希表的详细信息，请参阅 about_Hash_Tables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135175)。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the *ApplicationArguments* parameter of the **New-PSSessionOption** cmdlet to create a session option object that contains the data in the $team variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 *ApplicationArguments* 参数 **New-pssessionoption** cmdlet 来创建会话选项对象，其中包含 $team 变量中的数据。

trans-unit.source: The command saves the session option object in the $teamOption variable.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将该会话选项对象保存在 $teamOption 变量中。

trans-unit.source: When **New-PSSessionOption** creates the session option object, it automatically converts the hash table in the value of the *ApplicationArguments* parameter to a primitive dictionary so the data can be reliably transmitted to the remote session.
trans-unit.target: 当 **New-pssessionoption** 创建会话选项对象，它会自动将转换的值中的哈希表 *ApplicationArguments* 基元字典，以便数据可以可靠地传输到远程会话的参数。

trans-unit.source: The third command uses the New-PSSession cmdlet to start a session on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 第三个命令使用 New-pssession cmdlet 在 Server01 计算机上启动会话。

trans-unit.source: It uses the *SessionOption* parameter to include the options in the $teamOption variable.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 *SessionOption* 参数将这些选项包括在 $teamOption 变量。

trans-unit.source: The fourth command demonstrates that the data in the $team variable is available to commands in the remote session.
trans-unit.target: 第四个命令演示了 $team 变量中的数据可用于远程会话中的命令。

trans-unit.source: The data appears in the **ApplicationArguments** property of the $PSSenderInfo automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 数据显示在 **ApplicationArguments** $PSSenderInfo 自动变量的属性。

trans-unit.source: The fifth command shows how the data might be used.
trans-unit.target: 第五个命令显示了使用这些数据的可能方式。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a script only when the value of the **Use** property is not Testing.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 来运行脚本时，才的值 **使用** 不测试属性。

trans-unit.source: When the value of **Use** is Testing, the command returns Just testing.
trans-unit.target: 时的值 **使用** 测试，只测试该命令返回。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -ApplicationArguments
trans-unit.target: -ApplicationArguments

trans-unit.source: Specifies a primitive dictionary that is sent to the remote session.
trans-unit.target: 指定将发送到远程会话的基元字典。

trans-unit.source: Commands and scripts in the remote session, including startup scripts in the session configuration, can find this dictionary in the **ApplicationArguments** property of the $PSSenderInfo automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: 命令和脚本在远程会话中，在会话配置中，包括启动脚本中可以找到此字典中的 **ApplicationArguments** $PSSenderInfo 自动变量的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this parameter to send data to the remote session.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此参数来将数据发送到远程会话。

trans-unit.source: A primitive dictionary is like a hash table, but it contains keys that are case-insensitive strings and values that can be serialized and deserialized during Windows PowerShell remoting handshakes.
trans-unit.target: 基元字典类似于哈希表，但它包含区分大小写的字符串形式的键，以及可在 Windows PowerShell 远程处理握手过程中对其进行序列化和反序列化的值。

trans-unit.source: If you enter a hash table for the value of this parameter, Windows PowerShell converts it to a primitive dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 如果你输入此参数的值的哈希表，则 Windows PowerShell 会将其转换为基元字典。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Hash_Tables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135175), about_Session_Configurations (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145152), and about_Automatic_Variables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113212).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Hash_Tables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135175)、 about_Session_Configurations (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145152) 和 about_Automatic_Variables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113212)。

trans-unit.source: -CancelTimeout
trans-unit.target: -CancelTimeout

trans-unit.source: Determines how long Windows PowerShell waits for a cancel operation (CTRL + C) to finish before ending it.
trans-unit.target: 确定 Windows PowerShell 等待取消操作 （CTRL + C） 在结束它之前完成的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: Enter a value in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个值（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 60000 (one minute).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 60000（1 分钟）。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 (zero) means no time-out; the command continues indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0（零）表示无超时；该命令会无限期地继续运行。

trans-unit.source: -Culture
trans-unit.target: 区域性

trans-unit.source: Specifies the culture to use for the session.
trans-unit.target: 指定要用于会话的区域性。

trans-unit.source: Enter a culture name in \<languagecode2\>-\<country/regioncode2\> format, such as ja-jP, a variable that contains a **CultureInfo** object, or a command that gets a **CultureInfo** object, such as Get-Culture.
trans-unit.target: 输入中的区域性名称 \<languagecode2\>-\<country/regioncode2\> 格式，如 Ja-jp，包含的变量 **CultureInfo** 对象或一个可获取命令 **CultureInfo** 对象，如 Get 区域性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is $Null, and the culture that is set in the operating system is used in the session.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 $Null，并在会话中使用在操作系统中设置的区域性。

trans-unit.source: -IdleTimeout
trans-unit.target: -IdleTimeout

trans-unit.source: Determines how long the session stays open if the remote computer does not receive any communication from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 确定会话保持打开如果远程计算机没有从本地计算机接收任何通信状态多长时间。

trans-unit.source: This includes the heartbeat signal.
trans-unit.target: 这包括检测信号。

trans-unit.source: When the interval expires, the session closes.
trans-unit.target: 当时间间隔已过时，该会话将关闭。

trans-unit.source: The idle time-out value is of significant importance if you intend to disconnect and reconnect to a session.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要断开连接，然后重新连接的会话的空闲超时值非常重要。

trans-unit.source: You can reconnect only if the session has not timed out.
trans-unit.target: 仅当该会话未超时时，才可以重新连接。

trans-unit.source: Enter a value in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个值（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The minimum value is 60000 (1 minute).
trans-unit.target: 最小值为 60000（1 分钟）。

trans-unit.source: The maximum is the value of the **MaxIdleTimeoutms** property of the session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 最大的价值是 **MaxIdleTimeoutms** 会话配置的属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value, -1, does not set an idle time-out.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为-1，不会设置空闲超时。

trans-unit.source: The session uses the idle time-out that is set in the session options, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果有的话，则会话将使用在会话选项中设置的空闲超时值。

trans-unit.source: If none is set (-1), the session uses the value of the **IdleTimeoutMs** property of the session configuration or the WSMan shell time-out value (`WSMan:\\\<ComputerName\>\Shell\IdleTimeout`), whichever is shortest.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置 (-1)，该会话使用的值 **IdleTimeoutMs** 会话配置或 WSMan shell 超时值的属性 (`WSMan:\\\<ComputerName\>\Shell\IdleTimeout`)，以二者中较短者为准。

trans-unit.source: If the idle timeout set in the session options exceeds the value of the **MaxIdleTimeoutMs** property of the session configuration, the command to create a session fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果在会话选项中设置的空闲超时超出的值 **MaxIdleTimeoutMs** 属性的会话配置，该命令以创建会话失败。

trans-unit.source: The **IdleTimeoutMs** value of the default **Microsoft.PowerShell** session configuration is 7200000 milliseconds (2 hours).
trans-unit.target: **IdleTimeoutMs** 值的默认值 **Microsoft.PowerShell** 会话配置为 7200000 毫秒 （2 小时）。

trans-unit.source: Its **MaxIdleTimeoutMs** value is 2147483647 milliseconds (\>24 days).
trans-unit.target: 其 **MaxIdleTimeoutMs** 值为 2147483647 毫秒 (\>24 天)。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the WSMan shell idle time-out (`WSMan:\\\<ComputerName\>\Shell\IdleTimeout`) is 7200000 milliseconds (2 hours).
trans-unit.target: WSMan shell 空闲超时的默认值 (`WSMan:\\\<ComputerName\>\Shell\IdleTimeout`) 为 7200000 毫秒 （2 小时）。

trans-unit.source: The idle time-out value of a session can also be changed when disconnecting from a session or reconnecting to a session.
trans-unit.target: 从会话断开连接或重新连接到会话时，还可以更改会话的空闲超时值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Disconnect-PSSession and Connect-PSSession.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 Disconnect-pssession 和 Connect-pssession。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 2.0, the default value of the *IdleTimeout* parameter is 240000 (4 minutes).
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 2.0 中，默认值为 *IdleTimeout* 参数为 240000 （4 分钟）。

trans-unit.source: -IncludePortInSPN
trans-unit.target: -IncludePortInSPN

trans-unit.source: Includes the port number in the Service Principal Name (SPN) used for Kerberos authentication, for example, `HTTP/\<ComputerName\>:5985`.
trans-unit.target: 包括在服务主体名称 (SPN) 进行 Kerberos 身份验证，例如，使用的端口号 `HTTP/\<ComputerName\>:5985`。

trans-unit.source: This option allows a client that uses a non-default SPN to authenticate against a remote computer that uses Kerberos authentication.
trans-unit.target: 此选项允许客户端使用非默认 SPN 对使用 Kerberos 身份验证的远程计算机进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The option is designed for enterprises where multiple services that support Kerberos authentication are running under different user accounts.
trans-unit.target: 该选项旨在用于为在不同的用户帐户下运行的支持 Kerberos 身份验证的多个服务的企业。

trans-unit.source: For example, an IIS application that allows for Kerberos authentication can require the default SPN to be registered to a user account that differs from the computer account.
trans-unit.target: 例如，允许进行 Kerberos 身份验证的 IIS 应用程序可能需要将默认 SPN 注册到不同于计算机帐户的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: In such cases, Windows PowerShell remoting cannot use Kerberos to authenticate because it requires an SPN that is registered to the computer account.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，Windows PowerShell 远程处理无法使用 Kerberos 进行身份验证，因为它需要一个已注册到计算机帐户的 SPN。

trans-unit.source: To resolve this problem, administrators can create different SPNs, such as by using Setspn.exe, that are registered to different user accounts and can distinguish between them by including the port number in the SPN.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此问题，管理员可以创建不同的 Spn，如通过使用 Setspn.exe，注册到不同的用户帐户，可通过在 SPN 中包括端口号在它们之间进行区分。

trans-unit.source: For more information about SetSPN.exe, see SetSPN Overviewhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=189413 (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=189413).
trans-unit.target: 有关 SetSPN.exe 的详细信息，请参阅 SetSPN Overviewhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=189413 (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=189413)。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 已在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入了此参数。

trans-unit.source: -MaxConnectionRetryCount
trans-unit.target: -MaxConnectionRetryCount

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of times that PowerShell attempts to make a connection to a target machine if the current attempt fails due to network issues.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 PowerShell 尝试建立与目标计算机的连接，如果当前的尝试因网络问题而失败的次数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 5.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 5。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was added for PowerShell version 5.0.
trans-unit.target: 此参数已添加适用于 PowerShell 版本 5.0。

trans-unit.source: -MaximumReceivedDataSizePerCommand
trans-unit.target: -MaximumReceivedDataSizePerCommand

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of bytes that the local computer can receive from the remote computer in a single command.
trans-unit.target: 指定本地计算机在单个命令中可从远程计算机接收到的最大字节数。

trans-unit.source: Enter a value in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个值（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: By default, there is no data size limit.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，没有数据大小限制。

trans-unit.source: This option is designed to protect the resources on the client computer.
trans-unit.target: 此选项专门用于保护客户端计算机上的资源。

trans-unit.source: -MaximumReceivedObjectSize
trans-unit.target: -MaximumReceivedObjectSize

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum size of an object that the local computer can receive from the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定本地计算机可从远程计算机接收到的最大对象大小。

trans-unit.source: This option is designed to protect the resources on the client computer.
trans-unit.target: 此选项专门用于保护客户端计算机上的资源。

trans-unit.source: Enter a value in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个值（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 2.0, if you omit this parameter, there is no object size limit.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 2.0 中，如果省略此参数，则没有对象大小限制。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, if you omit this parameter, the default value is 200 MB.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始，如果省略此参数，则默认值为 200 MB。

trans-unit.source: -MaximumRedirection
trans-unit.target: -MaximumRedirection

trans-unit.source: Determines how many times Windows PowerShell redirects a connection to an alternate Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) before the connection fails.
trans-unit.target: 确定在连接失败之前，Windows PowerShell 将该连接重定向到备用统一资源标识符 (URI) 的次数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 5.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 5。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 (zero) prevents all redirection.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0（零）将阻止所有重定向。

trans-unit.source: This option is used in the session only when the *AllowRedirection* parameter is used in the command that creates the session.
trans-unit.target: 在会话中使用此选项仅当 *AllowRedirection* 命令可创建该会话中使用参数。

trans-unit.source: -NoCompression
trans-unit.target: -NoCompression

trans-unit.source: Turns off packet compression in the session.
trans-unit.target: 关闭会话中的数据包压缩。

trans-unit.source: Compression uses more processor cycles, but it makes transmission faster.
trans-unit.target: 压缩会占用更多的处理器周期，但可以提高传输速度。

trans-unit.source: -NoEncryption
trans-unit.target: -NoEncryption

trans-unit.source: Turns off data encryption.
trans-unit.target: 关闭数据加密。

trans-unit.source: -NoMachineProfile
trans-unit.target: -NoMachineProfile

trans-unit.source: Prevents loading the user's Windows user profile.
trans-unit.target: 阻止加载用户的 Windows 用户配置文件。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the session might be created faster, but user-specific registry settings, items such as environment variables, and certificates are not available in the session.
trans-unit.target: 这样做可以加快创建会话的速度，但不能在该会话使用特定于用户的注册表设置、环境变量等项以及证书。

trans-unit.source: -OpenTimeout
trans-unit.target: -OpenTimeout

trans-unit.source: Determines how long the client computer waits for the session connection to be established.
trans-unit.target: 确定客户端计算机等待建立会话连接的时长。

trans-unit.source: When the interval expires, the command to establish the connection fails.
trans-unit.target: 当时间间隔到期时，用于建立该连接的命令将失败。

trans-unit.source: Enter a value in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个值（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 180000 (3 minutes).
A value of 0 (zero) means no time-out; the command continues indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0（零）表示无超时；该命令会无限期地继续运行。

trans-unit.source: -OperationTimeout
trans-unit.target: -OperationTimeout

trans-unit.source: Determines the maximum time that any operation in the session can run.
trans-unit.target: 确定任一操作可在会话中运行的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: When the interval expires, the operation fails.
trans-unit.target: 当时间间隔到期时，该操作将失败。

trans-unit.source: Enter a value in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个值（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 180000 (3 minutes).
A value of 0 (zero) means no time-out; the operation continues indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0（零）表示无超时；该操作会无限期地继续运行。

trans-unit.source: -OutputBufferingMode
trans-unit.target: -OutputBufferingMode

trans-unit.source: Determines how command output is managed in disconnected sessions when the output buffer becomes full.
trans-unit.target: 当输出缓冲区时已满时，确定如何在断开连接的会话中管理命令输出。

trans-unit.source: If the output buffering mode is not set in the session or in the session configuration, the default value is **Block**.
trans-unit.target: 如果在会话中未设置输出缓冲模式或在会话配置中，默认值为 **块**。

trans-unit.source: Users can also change the output buffering mode when disconnecting the session.
trans-unit.target: 用户还可以在断开会话连接时更改输出缓冲模式。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter, the value of the **OutputBufferingMode** of the session option object is None.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数的值 **OutputBufferingMode** 的会话选项对象为 None。

trans-unit.source: A value of Block or Drop overrides the output buffering mode transport option set in the session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 块或 Drop 的值将覆盖输出缓冲模式传输选项在会话配置中设置。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are:
trans-unit.target: 此参数的可接受的值是：

trans-unit.source: Block.
trans-unit.target: 块。

trans-unit.source: When the output buffer is full, execution is suspended until the buffer is clear.
trans-unit.target: 当输出缓冲区已满时，将挂起执行，直到清除此缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Drop.
trans-unit.target: 删除。

trans-unit.source: When the output buffer is full, execution continues.
trans-unit.target: 当输出缓冲区已满时，执行将继续。

trans-unit.source: As new output is saved, the oldest output is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 由于已保存新的输出，因此将丢弃最早的输出。

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 无。

trans-unit.source: No output buffering mode is specified.
trans-unit.target: 未指定任何输出缓冲模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the output buffering mode transport option, see New-PSTransportOption.
trans-unit.target: 有关输出缓冲模式传输选项的详细信息，请参阅 New-pstransportoption。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 已在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入了此参数。

trans-unit.source: -ProxyAccessType
trans-unit.target: -ProxyAccessType

trans-unit.source: Determines which mechanism is used to resolve the host name.
trans-unit.target: 确定用于解析主机名的机制。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are:
trans-unit.target: 此参数的可接受的值是：

trans-unit.source: IEConfig
trans-unit.target: IEConfig

trans-unit.source: WinHttpConfig
trans-unit.target: WinHttpConfig

trans-unit.source: AutoDetect
trans-unit.target: 自动检测

trans-unit.source: NoProxyServer
trans-unit.target: NoProxyServer

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The default value is None.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 None。

trans-unit.source: For information about the values of this parameter, see the description of the System.Management.Automation.Remoting.ProxyAccessTypehttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144756 (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144756) enumeration in the Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) library.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值的信息，请参阅 Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) 库中 System.Management.Automation.Remoting.ProxyAccessTypehttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144756 (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144756) 枚举的说明。

trans-unit.source: -ProxyAuthentication
trans-unit.target: -ProxyAuthentication

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication method that is used for proxy resolution.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于代理解析的身份验证方法。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are: Basic, Digest, and Negotiate.
trans-unit.target: 为此参数可接受的值︰ 基本、 摘要式和协商。

trans-unit.source: The default value is Negotiate.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为协商。

trans-unit.source: For information about the values of this parameter, see the description of the System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.AuthenticationMechanismhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144382 enumeration (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144382) in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值的信息，请参阅 MSDN library 中 System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.AuthenticationMechanismhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144382 枚举 (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144382) 的说明。

trans-unit.source: -ProxyCredential
trans-unit.target: -ProxyCredential

trans-unit.source: Specifies the credentials to use for proxy authentication.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于代理身份验证的凭据。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains a **PSCredential** object or a command that gets a **PSCredential** object, such as a Get-Credential command.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个包含变量 **PSCredential** 对象或一个可获取命令 **PSCredential** 对象，如 Get-credential 命令。

trans-unit.source: If this option is not set, no credentials are specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此选项，则不指定任何凭据。

trans-unit.source: -SkipCACheck
trans-unit.target: -SkipCACheck

trans-unit.source: Specifies that when it connects over HTTPS, the client does not validate that the server certificate is signed by a trusted certification authority (CA).
trans-unit.target: 指定通过 HTTPS 连接之后，客户端不会验证服务器证书进行签名的受信任的证书颁发机构 (CA)。

trans-unit.source: Use this option only when the remote computer is trusted by using another mechanism, such as when the remote computer is part of a network that is physically secure and isolated or when the remote computer is listed as a trusted host in a WinRM configuration.
trans-unit.target: 仅当远程计算机通过其他机制受信任（例如远程计算机所属的网络在物理上是安全的并已隔离，或者远程计算机在 WinRM 配置中列为受信任主机）时才使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: -SkipCNCheck
trans-unit.target: -SkipCNCheck

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the certificate common name (CN) of the server does not have to match the host name of the server.
trans-unit.target: 指定服务器的证书公用名 (CN) 不需要与服务器的主机名匹配。

trans-unit.source: This option is used only in remote operations that use the HTTPS protocol.
trans-unit.target: 仅在使用 HTTPS 协议的远程操作中使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Use this option only for trusted computers.
trans-unit.target: 仅将此选项用于受信任的计算机。

trans-unit.source: -SkipRevocationCheck
trans-unit.target: -SkipRevocationCheck

trans-unit.source: Does not validate the revocation status of the server certificate.
trans-unit.target: 不验证服务器证书的吊销状态。

trans-unit.source: -UICulture
trans-unit.target: -UICulture

trans-unit.source: Specifies the UI culture to use for the session.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于会话的 UI 区域性。

trans-unit.source: Enter a culture name in \<languagecode2\>-\<country/regioncode2\> format, such as ja-jP, a variable that contains a **CultureInfo** object, or a command that gets a **CultureInfo** object, such as **Get-Culture**.
trans-unit.target: 输入中的区域性名称 \<languagecode2\>-\<country/regioncode2\> 格式，如 Ja-jp，包含的变量 **CultureInfo** 对象或一个可获取命令 **CultureInfo** 对象，如 **Get-culture**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is $Null, and the UI culture that is set in the operating system when the session is created is used in the session.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 $Null，并在会话中使用创建会话时，在操作系统中设置的 UI 区域性。

trans-unit.source: -UseUTF16
trans-unit.target: -UseUTF16

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet encodes the request in UTF16 format instead of UTF8 format.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 将编码 UTF16 格式而不是 UTF8 格式中的请求。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将输入传递给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.Remoting.PSSessionOption
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.Remoting.PSSessionOption

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: If the *SessionOption* parameter is not used in a command to create a **PSSession**, the session options are determined by the property values of the $PSSessionOption preference variable, if it is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果 *SessionOption* 参数不用于在命令中，来创建 **PSSession**, ，则会话选项确定 $PSSessionOption 首选项变量，这些属性值，如果将其设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the $PSSessionOption variable, see about_Preference_Variables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113248).
trans-unit.target: 有关 $PSSessionOption 变量的详细信息，请参阅 about_Preference_Variables (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113248)。

trans-unit.source: The properties of a session configuration object vary with the options set for the session configuration and the values of those options.
trans-unit.target: 会话配置对象的属性会根据为会话配置设置的选项以及这些选项的值而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Also, session configurations that use a session configuration file have additional properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用会话配置文件的会话配置还具有其他属性。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.source: Enter-PSSession
trans-unit.target: Enter-PSSession

trans-unit.source: Invoke-Command
trans-unit.target: Invoke-Command

trans-unit.source: New-PSSession
trans-unit.target: New-PSSession
